rows.label: qst000803_msg0001
rows.name: Urgh... So this is it, huh?

rows.label: qst000803_msg0002
rows.name:
But I swear, you won't be laying one
foot near my grandpa's treasure. Even
if it costs me my life...

rows.label: qst000803_msg0003
rows.name:
...What? All you did was find a knife
with my name on it? That's it?

rows.label: qst000803_msg0004
rows.name:
No, I'm the one who should be
sorry here. I guess I went and
jumped to the wrong conclusion.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0005
rows.name:
It's a tough life, hunting solo. Makes
you get in the habit of blurting out
your life story to total strangers.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0006
rows.name:
And sometimes you get bad sorts.
The kind that'll kill for treasure.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0007
rows.name:
Thanks for the concern. But don't
worry.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0008
rows.name:
My grandpa warned me that the life of
a treasure hunter is like walking on a
tightrope. You've gotta be prepared.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0009
rows.name:
Now where were we...?
Oh yeah, you brought me this knife.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0010
rows.name:
This was a present from my grandpa.
I wanted to open the second chest with
it, and managed to break it real good.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0011
rows.name:
"Wealth and fortune," it said on it.
But a broken lucky charm isn't going
to bring anything but bad luck.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0012
rows.name:
So I gave up on the treasure and
parted with the knife there.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0013
rows.name:
But now your merry band of Drivers
have brought it back to me. Funny,
isn't it?

rows.label: qst000803_msg0014
rows.name:
I guess this must be the workings
of some higher power.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0015
rows.name:
I mean, you bested me in a fight.
My grandpa would kill me himself
if it turned out you were weaklings!

rows.label: qst000803_msg0016
rows.name:
Anyhow, I'll be off. Got some
journeying ahead before I reach
my next destination.

rows.label: qst000803_msg0017
rows.name:
Time to get my hands on some
ancient Nopon relics!

rows.label: qst000803_msg0018
rows.name:
You'd better not be thinking about
getting to 'em before me, you hear?
